definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Commitment to animal welfare issues and to promoting IFAW's mission.
sentences.chinese: 理解动物福利理念，并愿意推动IFAW宗旨。

sentences.english: Communicate with orphanage directors and hospital staff.
sentences.chinese: 与儿童福利院院长及医院职员联络。

sentences.english: Occasionally, however, standards of poultry welfare must be safeguarded by legislation.
sentences.chinese: 然而有时候家禽福利标准必须由立法来保障。

sentences.english: In New Zealand, welfare payments, pensions and other compensation.
sentences.chinese: 在新西兰接受福利费，养老金和其它报酬。

sentences.english: A：Do you know when our governmental housing will be assigned?
sentences.chinese: 你知道政府福利房分配方案何时出台吗？

sentences.english: They have abandoned their children to the tender mercies of the social services.
sentences.chinese: 他们遗弃了孩子，任其在社会福利中听天由命。

sentences.english: We will energetically develop social welfare programs.
sentences.chinese: 积极发展社会福利事业。

sentences.english: The union is oriented towards welfare capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 工会以福利资本主义为其奋斗目标。

sentences.english: They paid their taxes, why can’t they get all their promised benefits?
sentences.chinese: 他们老实纳税，为什么不能得到许诺给他们的福利？

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare, is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 有人甚至怀疑现代福利院，是民政部门的小金库。

sentences.english: Second, the pay and benefits, the realization of the merger of the existing dual pay system.
sentences.chinese: 其次在薪酬福利方面，实现现有的双薪酬体系并轨。

sentences.english: threatens to report the other parent to welfare
sentences.chinese: 威胁将对方的父母送去福利院？

sentences.english: Compulsion in the area of family welfare must be ruled out for all times to come.
sentences.chinese: 在家庭福利方面的强制必须及时废除。

sentences.english: And do Western welfare states have to be quite so buffet-like?
sentences.chinese: 还有，西方福利社会一定要像个自助餐一样无度吗？

sentences.english: Attempts to paint the family as welfare scroungers have failed.
sentences.chinese: 把这个家庭的人描绘成福利敲诈者的企图已经失败了。

sentences.english: It's a stellar example of using technology for social good.
sentences.chinese: 它是个很好的利用科技为社会谋福利的例子。

definition: abbr. for 特別優惠|特别优惠[te4 bie2 you1 hui4]/ex gratia
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
(sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)
to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
painted eggshell/Easter egg/(media) Easter egg (hidden feature in software or a movie etc)/post-credits scene
bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
to give an extra subsidy, or bonus etc/bonus/perquisite
